Name: Aggro
Text: Deal (Lv) damage to a target. That target focuses on you during their next attack.

Name: Reflect
Text: When an ally in your Zone takes damage, reduce the damage by (Lv). Deal (PIB) damage to the attacking enemy. This can be done during any Phase.

Name: Protean
Text: Choose (PIB) targets. For each target, deal (LV+PIB) damage or heal (Lv+PIB) Health.

Name: Soul Bond
Text: When an ally takes damage, you take the damage instead. Reduce the damage by Lv+PIB.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Choose an ally with 0 Health. Next Player Phase, their Health is restored to half of your Max Health.

Name: Passage of Arms
Text: Reduce all damage by (Lv) for all allies in your Zone until the next Player Phase. You still take full damage. This can be used during any Phase, once Per Phase.
